title: 3 Reasons Not To Break Up Facebook
text: Chris Hughes, a Facebook co-founder who says he sold all of his shares in 2012, believes the company should be broken up. He was as wrong about Facebook in 2012 as he is now.

title: Facebook co founder: 'It's not a personal beef, but it is personal'
text: Facebook co-founder Chris Hughes argues Facebook lacks accountability and that "it's up to government to come in, break up the company and set this baseline of standards.

title: Twitter vs. Facebook
text: Learn why Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram each appeal to different target markets of users of social networks worldwide.

title: Facebook's Top Companies and Brands
text: Facebook is a titan of the tech space. As one of the largest social media companies in the world, Facebook's basic platform is a launching point for many of its other companies and brands.

title: Facebook Stock: Days of Future Past
text: Facebook will focus more on Instagram, Whatsapp and Messenger in the future, becoming the globe's common carrier.

title: Global Saturation Poses a Challenge to Facebook Stock
text:
Facebook stock appears unaffected by regulatory scrutiny, but global saturation could force FB stock to pursue a different type of investor.
The post Global Saturation Poses a Challenge to Facebook Stock appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: The Wall Street Journal: France steps up hate-speech, security policing of Facebook, other social media
text: The French government plans to give regulators here sweeping power to audit and fine large social-media companies like Facebook Inc.
